MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G69 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00am this is to safely carry out repairs to an underground cable fault at Greentrees avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:11am on Wednesday, 06 January 2021
